text: The Johor–Singapore Causeway is a 1,056-metre causeway that links the city of Johor Bahru in Malaysia across the Straits of Johor to the town of Woodlands in Singapore. It serves as a road and rail link, as well as a water pipeline between the two countries. Category:Woodlands, Singapore Category:Bridges in Malaysia Category:Johor
title: Johor–Singapore Causeway
